Art was SUPERB.

I don‚Äôt think you need to add much more too the ending really but I think you should add more details in between otherwise it gets confusing and I start struggling to see logic at important parts.

I hope you take my words of advice.

So I don‚Äôt usually write reviews, but when I opened the game and heard shiloh dynasty playing I knew I had to. üòÇ
This game‚Äôs art style is so pretty. The characters are drawn really well! It‚Äôs a short game (really short, took me about 10 minutes) and is more just swiping through, but I really enjoyed it. It was very calming, and you also get attached to the characters pretty quickly.
The only thing is that it was so short that I replayed the last part over and over to see if I did something wrong, because it ended on a cliffhanger! I think the ending makes sense, but I still wish it would go on. Maybe like one added part that shows what happens after you click ‚Äúturn around‚Äù or ‚Äúmove on‚Äù, just because the ending was a bit bittersweet (and I need confirmation that they get back together üò≠). But I don‚Äôt really mind the ending because I can guess what it would be like.
So yeah, it‚Äôs a really short game, and more like a story than a game, but I definitely recommend because of the graphics and story in general. :))
